page.title: 17Language-Westmorland Dialect
page.content:
Thoo's nivver hard 'O Marton? Thoo'll see't fra t'auld barn door It's a gay queer spot,is Marton, If thoo's nivver bin afoor.
If thoo ivver gaas to Marton? Thoo'd better watch thisel Thoo'd loss thi hat fer sarton, If t'helm was blowan off t'fell.
Translation.
You've never heard of Marton? You'll see it from the old barn door, It's a funny place,is Marton, If You've never been before.
If you ever go to Marton? You'd better watch yourself, You'd loose your hat for certain If the helm(wind) was blowing off the fell.
